title: Lee Barnes Scholars Program
Description:: The Lee Barnes Scholars Program is available to entering freshmen at Appalachian State University.  You must be academically successful, demonstrate leadership skills and financial need to be eligible for this award.

title: Mark and Robin Wyatt Scholarship
Description:: The Mark and Robin Wyatt Scholarship is available to entering freshmen at Appalachian State University.

title: Natalie Carter Freeman Endowed Scholarship for Business
Description:: The Natalie Carter Freeman Endowed Scholarship for Business is available to entering freshmen at Appalachian State University.  You must be an business major to be eligible for this award.

title: H. M. Hulburt Annual Scholarship
Description:: The H. M. Hulburt Annual Scholarship is available to entering sophomores at Appalachian State University.

title: Beroth Golf Tournament Scholarship
Description:: The Beroth Golf Tournament Scholarship is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University.

title: College of Business Upper Division
Description:: The College of Business Upper Division is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University.

title: The Honorable Harlan E. Boyles Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The Honorable Harlan E. Boyles Endowed Scholarship is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University.

title: Mast Store Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The Mast Store Endowed Scholarship is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University.

title: Maymead Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The Maymead Endowed Scholarship is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University.

title: Walker Fellows Scholarship
Description:: The Walker Fellows Scholarship is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University.

title: Best Friends Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The Best Friends Endowed Scholarship is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University. You must submit one page essay required describing yourself and best friend to be eligible for this award.

title: Broyhill Institute for Business Scholarships
Description:: The Broyhill Institute for Business Scholarships is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University. You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.  Preference given to Caldwell County residents.

title: Carroll Leather Goods Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The Carroll Leather Goods Endowed Scholarship is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University. You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5 to be eligible for this award.  Special consideration will be given to students from the Grandfather Home for Children

title: Edwards Family Scholarship
Description:: The Edwards Family Scholarship is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University. You must have a minimum GPA of 3.25 to be eligible for this award.  Perference will be given to first-generation students.

title: Everett and Cornelia McConnell Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The Edwards Family Scholarship is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University. You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5 to be elgiible for this award.  Preference given to residents of Alexander, Alleghany, Ashe, Avery, Burke, Caldwell, Catawba, McDowell, Mitchell, Watauga or Wilkes Counties.

title: Franks Brothers Scholarship in the WCOB
Description:: The Franks Brothers Scholarship in the WCOB is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University. You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5, NC resident and demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

title: George G. Beasley Family Business & Broadcasting Scholarship
Description:: The George G. Beasley Family Business & Broadcasting Scholarship in the WCOB is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University. You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.  Presence will be given to Patrick County, Virginia & Surry County & Mount Airy, NC residents.

title: Jackson Paul Vogel Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Jackson Paul Vogel Memorial Scholarship in the WCOB is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University. You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0, demonstrate financial need and involvement in on-campus activities to be eligible for this award.  Preference given to employed students.

title: J. Allen Joines Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The J. Allen Joines Endowed Scholarship in the WCOB is available to entering junior and senior students at Appalachian State University. You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0, demonstrate financial need and involvement in on-campus activities to be eligible for this award.  Preference given to employed students.

title: Classic Federal Credit Union Scholarship
Description:: The Classic Federal Credit Union Scholarship is open to high school seniors who attend a high school in Clermont County.  You must be a member of the Classic Federal Credit Union and have a minimum GPA of 3.0 in order to qualify for this award.

title: Clermont County Retired Teachers Association Scholarship
Description:: The Clermont County Retired Teachers Association Scholarship is available to Goshen High School seniors.  You must be planning to pursue a career in teaching in order to qualify for this award.

title: Current Surfaces, Inc. Track Athlete Scholarship
Description:: The Current Surfaces, Inc. Track Athlete Scholarship is available to graduating Goshen High School students.  You must have participated in track for at least three years and have a minimum GPA of 2.0 in order to qualify for this award.

title: Goshen Chamber of Commerce Scholarship
Description:: The Goshen Chamber of Commerce Scholarship is open to seniors at Goshen High School.  You must be planning to major in business or a business related field in order to qualify for this award.

title: Goshen Support Staff Scholarship
Description:: The Goshen Support Staff  Scholarship is open to seniors at Goshen High School.  You must have a GPA between 2.5 and 3.4 in order to qualify for this award.

title: Mercy Hospital Clermont's Guild and Foundation Scholarship
Description:: The Mercy Hospital Clermont's Guild and Foundation Scholarship is open to seniors at Goshen High School.  You must be majoring in an education program in a health care field and have a minimum GPA of 3.0 in order to qualify for this award.

title: Mike Spilman Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Mike Spilman Memorial Scholarship is open to seniors at Goshen High School.  You must be planning to major in athletic training or a related healthcare field and have a minimum GPA of 2.5 in order to qualify for this award.
